tourBios.curYrHigh: Joined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica with a T5 finish at the Sebring, Florida Q-School in January.
tourBios.carHigh:
Has played mini tour golf for several years, competing on the Minor League Golf Tour, the NGA Tour, the New England Tour and the Tarhell Tour.

2013: Missed the cut at South Georgia Classic on his first career start on the Web.com Tour.

2012: Missed the cut at the Travelers Championship on his first career start on the PGA TOUR.
tourBios.personal: Attended Miller Place High School... Has a sister, Danielle... Twitter name is @JAmazinHazen
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 2-11 at 2016 Q-School (exempt to midseason reshuffle)
